commit message:
Refactoring

1. Use an empty string instead of '-1' to disable TCP debugging.
2. Add getAdbTcpPort() and setAdbTcpPort() methods to deal with
getprop/setprop stuff separately from the logic behind enabling
and disabling debugging.
Highlight adb connect command Surround the text of the 'adb connect x.x.x.x' command by ... tags to make it stand out.
Fix ADB connection loss on orientation change
